Label: Current
Terminal/Module_Type: ESP32 ADC via RC anti-alias + divider/buffer

Label: VAC
Terminal/Module_Type: ESP32 ADC with bias to ~1.65 V + RC anti-alias

Label: VDC
Explanation: auguer motor (1) + conditioner pump (1) + solenoid valve (3) + stacklight (1) + fans (4)

Label: Ultrasound emitters
Explanation: de-clogs the muck before entering the auger

Label: Solenoid Valve
Explanation: controls spray nozzles - 1 in center for low velo zone, 2 more all on muck reservoir side of bottom plate

Label: Auger Motor
Explanation: turns auger to lift muck from reservoir, stock VFD-controlled

Label: Stacklight
Explanation: notifies team for safe to approach, red alert, etc.

Label: Conditioner Pump
Explanation: transfers conditioning fluid to cutter head

Label: IO‑Link Master/Edge
Explanation: Alternative/companion to Turck masters; edge logic + Modbus TCP/EtherNet‑IP/PROFINET.

Label: Panel Feed‑through (Ethernet)
Explanation: Clean, sealed panel transition between M12 in the field and RJ45 inside the cabinet.

Label: IO‑Link Cable (Class A)
Explanation: Standard IO‑Link device cable for Class‑A ports (power + C/Q over 3–4 wires).

Label: E-Stop
Explanation: cuts power to the power distribution box and the motor
